Posts.Content: Tara, So sorry to hear that you still aren't feeling any better. Good for you ,keeping after them till you get what you need.I will be praying for you as you go through your test and that they will find out what is causing you all this pain. Take care of you and keep us posted. God Bless Debbie
Posts.Title: Another Test

Posts.Content: Hi Kelli, I will be praying for you as you go for your mamo that all is well.I know what you mean I get so nervous everytime I have to go for any test.Let us know how you make out. God Bless Debbie
Posts.Title: in need of prayer and reassurance

Posts.Content: AMEN TO THAT HUMMB!!!!! You are truly a blessing and I am glad you found us. God Bless Debbie
Posts.Title: Death and dying....a hot topic!

Posts.Content: Tara, I am sorry to hear that you are still not feeling well.My thoughts and prayers are with you.We do know our own bodies and we usually know when we have a problem,hang in there and make them listen to you.Don't give up and my prayer is that you will find peace and comfort and that this will be a better year for you. God Bless Debbie
Posts.Title: Just to let you know

Posts.Content: Kelli, I will be praying for you and your family. Keep us posted on how you are doing. God Bless Debbie
Posts.Title: In need of Prayers

Posts.Content: Hi Grandma, I will be praying for you and your hubby as you both continue treatment.I had a friend shave the rest of my hair off once it started falling out. My hubby told me he would shave his his to match me if I wanted him to ,I told him he didn't have to, but I thought how sweet of him and told him so. At about this time last year I was still wearing my ball cap.Glad to hear that you have such a positive attitude. Keep us posted. God Bless Debbie
Posts.Title: up-date

Posts.Content: Hi Grandma, I know it is tuff but you can do it. I will keep you and your hubby in my prayers. There were days when I had all I could do to get out of the recliner. I only got sick on the first treatment then they tried different meds. and it worked for me . I was just completely exhausted and I kept getting dehydrated so I had to have ivs all the time. Try and drink lots of water the more the better.My first 4 treatments I could not get water down so they told me any fluids the last 4 were the Taxol and I drank water all the time.Remember my prayers are with you and keep us posted. God Bless Debbie
Posts.Title: 1st chemo

Posts.Content: Hi Flo, Glad to here you are drinking alot of water. The Taxol just made me really tired for quite a few days but never sick.Unfortunatley that is all I did was eat so I did gain weight, who can figure most people lose weight.Keep me posted and God Bless Debbie
Posts.Title: 1st chemo

Posts.Content: I had the same chemothearpy and I took meds for the nausea compazine. I agree if what they are giving you isn't helping ask for something different. Also drink lots of water or some type of fluid that always seemed to help me I kept getting dehydrated and would have to go in for IV. Just rest when your body tells you chemo isn't a picnic but it sure is worth it in the end. God Bless Debbie
Posts.Title: Chemotherapy Cyttoxan & Adriamycian

Posts.Content: Hi Jayne, I will be praying that there is nothing wrong with your liver.We do know who holds our hand and he is in complete control.May our Lord give you a peace and comfort that only he can give. I will be away for awhile but I will check in with you when I get back. God Bless Debbie
Posts.Title: Liver concerns

Posts.Content: Hi Tara, Hope you have a wonderful vacation with your family. God bless and keep you in his care. Debbie
Posts.Title: Just a note

Posts.Content: Hi Grandma, Praise the Lord for your good news!!! So glad to hear that you two are doing well.I have been wondering about both of you and you are both in my prayers.Keep on kickin butt and keep us informed on how you are both doing.Your spirt is great. God Bless Debbie
Posts.Title: Kickin butt!!

Posts.Content: Hi Flo, I am with you PRAISE THE LORD for those great results on your scans and x-rays.God is so good AMEN!!! Glad to hear that your hubby is doing a little better too.I will still keep you both in my prayers.Take care and let us know how you are both doing. God Bless Debbie
Posts.Title: test results

Posts.Content: Hi Tara, I am so happy to heard that you have finally got some relief, it is about time. You are a very strong lady and a fighter for sure.Please be sure and keep us updated on how you are doing.My prayers are with you always. God Bless Debbie
Posts.Title: Returning to a Life I knew I would find
